HacknetExtension.Name: Digital Rebels
HacknetExtension.Description: Join the HackerCorps as they investigate the mysterious NWLC, and their suspicious 'Project TRIAD' as you enter a world of hacking few have ever seen before...
HacknetExtension.WorkshopDescription:
\-|-Digital Rebels-|-\ "Nothing is ever as it seems..." Enter a world of hacking unlike any other- join the HackerCorps as they investigate the mysterious NWLC and their suspicious Project TRIAD.
This extension is story based with multiple endings, but it still has quite a bit of gameplay to it. Thank you for subscribing!
